item.title: PyPad 1.7.3-prerelease
item.description: - Expanded Preferences with unified PyPad + N++ compatibility pages and refined Notepad++-style navigation - Added user-selectable logging level and broader DEBUG instrumentation (AI chat/controller, updater, autosave, file ops) - Debug Logs can now include process-wide console output (root logging + stdout/stderr capture) - AI chat now shows OpenAI-style attachment chips and richer apply-flow tracing with correlation IDs - AI chat message bubbles now show hover actions (edit/copy for prompts, retry/copy/insert for responses) - Editing an older prompt now rewrites that prompt in-place and regenerates from that point with a clear warning - AI "replace current tab" offers now ask for confirmation before replacing tab contents - Fixed AI chat streaming thread-to-UI callback issue that could cause freezes/closes during replies - AI chat auto-scroll now follows new replies only when already near the bottom (send still jumps to latest) - Added rich editor right-click context menu with AI/PyPad actions, quick AI row, icons, and style submenu - Added runtime hooks for N++ compatibility settings (new doc encoding/EOL, indentation defaults, print templates, link schemes) - Improved dialog theming consistency and fixed startup recovery dialog taskbar visibility - Detailed changelogs can be found at Changelog.md
